spec_data.Name: perl-ParseTemplate
spec_data.Description:
The Parse::Template class evaluates Perl expressions placed within a text.
This class can be used as a code generator, or a generator of documents in
various document formats (HTML, XML, RTF, etc.).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:01:54 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Processor for templates containing Perl expressions
